title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Comprehensively gather and document all technical requirements for the blockchain-based product tracking and verification system, addressing stakeholder needs, system constraints, expected functionality, data models, security considerations (including potential attack vectors and mitigation strategies), scalability requirements, performance expectations, integration points with existing systems, and any necessary user experience design considerations. This should include a clear definition of the system's functional and non-functional requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the blockchain network, data models, and integration with existing systems.

title: Develop Blockchain Network
description: Implement the blockchain network, including node setup, consensus mechanism, and smart contract deployment.

title: Build Product Tracking and Verification System
description: Develop the system for tracking and verifying product origin and transactions, including user interfaces and integration with the blockchain network.

title: Implement Data Integration
description: Integrate the system with existing data sources and systems to ensure seamless data flow and synchronization.

title: Develop Security and Access Controls
description: Implement security measures and access controls to ensure data integrity, privacy, and system security.

title: Test and Quality Assurance
description: Perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure system quality and reliability.
dependencies: Build Product Tracking and Verification System

title: Deploy and Maintain System
description: Deploy the system to production environments, set up monitoring and logging, and establish maintenance procedures.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides to support system adoption and usage.
dependencies: Build Product Tracking and Verification System
